title: Early Spanish Adventures by Music Movement & Imagination
description:
Come learn your first Spanish lessons with this fun, sing-along CD! This CD contains all 18 songs from the MMMKids Early Spanish Adventures series, our MMM Theme and Warm up songs, plus two Bonus Tracks. Songs cover counting, ABC's, Days of the Week, Months, Greetings and much more!
